content: skill level beginner mom s favorite scrubby @kmtcreations2017 materials size i 5 50 hook weight 4 cotton yarn scrubby yarn i can get 3-4 scrubbies from 1 of each skein abbreviations chain- chain half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch gauge unimportant ​ 1 pattern notes 1 this pattern is worked as 2 separate pieces that are joined at the end ​ 2 it may be difficult to see where the next stitch goes when working on the scrubby side as long as you count as you are working it will line up with the cotton side 3 if you want the completed scrubby to be lined with the scrubby material make the cotton side first if you d like it to be lined with the cotton make the scrubby side first 4 safe to use on teflon pattern make one in cotton and one in scrubby yarn please read pattern note #3 to know which one to start with ​ to start work 10 half_double_crochet in a magic_ring -alternatively you can ch4 slip_stitch to join in the 4th chain from the hook ch1 and work 10 half_double_crochet in the circle slip_stitch to the first stitch ch1 10 round 1 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to the first stitch ch1 20 round 2 2 half_double_crochet in the first stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next *2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next stitch * repeat ** around slip_stitch to the first stitch ch1 30 round 3 2 half_double_crochet in the first stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 stitches *2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 stitches * repeat ** around slip_stitch to the first stitch ch1 40 round 4 2 half_double_crochet in the first stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next 3 stitches *2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch 1 half_double_crochet in the next 3 stitches * repeat ** around slip_stitch to the first stitch ch1 50 after the first one break yarn and repeat the pattern with the other yarn after the second one is complete do not break yarn put both sides together with the wrong side of one facing the wrong side of the other with the cotton side facing you final round single_crochet in the each stitch around working through both sides slip_stitch in the first stitch 50 finish off break yarn weave in ends copyright this pattern is protected by a copyright by testing or downloading it you agree to
